About Me

I'm a researcher and engineer passionate about medical imaging, pattern recognition, and machine learning. With experience in both academia and industry, I strive to create solutions that matter.

My expertise spans from image processing and computer vision to full-stack software development. I'm a strong advocate for open source and collaborative development.
